ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 531
ygData.msgSnippet: I have looked over all the jewellery that an enchanter can make. I also realize there are earrings, rings, etc available to higher level players from
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
I have looked over all the jewellery that an enchanter
can make.
I also realize there are earrings, rings, etc
available to higher
level players from dungeons. This is my take on the
best player
made jewellery in the game for a bard, and what I
currently wear.

face: platinum star ruby veil, cha9 dex9
neck: golden black pearl choker, agi7 dex7
ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5
finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5


</snip>


For now, I wear a platinum black pearl ring (agi +6,
dex +6) and a platinum fire emerald ring (dex +5, str
+5). I can't charm yet, so my cha seems to not be as
important. I own a set of the gold star ruby rings,
and electrum cats eye agate bracers, too. I only wear
them for selling and buying, right now. As far as
bracers - I've been blessed with a pair of serpentine
bracers - (str +3, agi +9) they seem to help a lot. I
zoned into Droon the other night, and dodged 4 arracks
in a row, before zoning.
Aside from those differences, that's exactly what I
wear. I'll post my stats at a later date.



Double Entendre
Bard of 21 Songs
Exposing himself for a bind, somewhere on Innoruuk
